projects.title: Streetr - Prototype
projects.desc: An interactive application prototype made with Marvel and Sketch

projects.title: Instant System Internship Report
projects.desc: An oral report for my second internship in Epitech

projects.title: Covoit83
projects.desc: My internship was initially to migrate a carpooling site developed in TYPO3 to wordpress. This migration involves the integration of a graphic chart and the development of an administrator interface.

projects.title: R'pro'Covoiturage
projects.desc: My internship was initially to migrate a carpooling site developed in TYPO3 to wordpress. This migration involves the integration of a graphic chart and the development of an administrator interface.

projects.title: Barde.io
projects.desc: In order to preempt our EIP (Epitech Innovate Project), I realized the site www.barde.io by complying with a graphic charter.Developed with the AngularJs framework, this showcase includes integrations allowing registration to a newletter and a contact form protected by a Captcha system.

projects.title: ProLinked
projects.desc: In order to materialize the idea of two business school students, I initially realized a pre-launch page of the service. Subsequently, I was able to create an authentication system (Registration, login, profile management) combined with a system of SMS verification and automated e-mail sending.

projects.title: Stock Manager
projects.desc: Having contributed to a Hackathon organized by Epitech, my role was to create a tool to facilitate the management of stock within a fire station. With this solution, the user can dynamically add and remove an object from a database and have an overview of the current stock.

projects.title: Sochic Bijoux
projects.desc: The first part of my 2nd year internship at EPITECH consisted of optimizing the daily update of elements in a database. Subsequently, I was able to completely rebuild an e-commerce website. The front end includes authentication, display of products in their categories, presentation of a retail item, addition to the shopping cart and integration of a payment module. For the back-end part, I was able to develop a module for generating invoices and a voucher system, allowing to change the status of orders made on the site (Sent / Paid / Shipped ..)
